schema_metadata.description: Definition and interpretation rules for ITSM ticket work logs.

Incident Number.instruction: Group all entries by this ID.

Submitter.instruction: The ID of the person or system creating the log.

root_cause_analysis.strategy: Look for the specific 'turning point' in the logs.
priority_signals: Work Log Type equals 'Vendor Ticket Information'
root_cause_analysis.instruction: The Root Cause is rarely in the first few logs. It is usually found in the final 20% of the log history.

contact_identification.internal_support_team: Any 'Submitter' who creates a log with 'View Access' = 'Internal'.
contact_identification.customer_identification: Often inferred contextually. If a log is 'Customer Communication' (Public), the recipient mentioned in the text is the customer.

current_status_logic.method: Check the Work Log Type of the very last entry (sorted by Date).

rules.Pending Vendor: If last log type is 'Vendor Ticket Information'.
